segments.text: This is frank speaking , may i ask who is calling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Jane , I'd like to speak to Mr.Wang , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , he is not here at the moment . He has gone to the International Business Center .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When do you expect him back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure , he didn't say when he wound return . If you'd like.you can leave him a message until he is back to you until the moment it's free .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , thank you . When he gets back , please just let him know that jane called . And i need him to call me back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , he does . But i give it to you again . 5264453 6
segments.speaker: S2
